actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To repeal the provision of the Tax Reform Act of 1986 which requires a taxpayer to include on his tax return the tax identification number of dependents who have attained age 5.

summary.text: Repeals a specified provision of the Tax Reform Act of 1986 that requires a taxpayer to include a tax identification number for each dependent aged five or older claimed on an income tax return.

titles.title: To repeal the provision of the Tax Reform Act of 1986 which requires a taxpayer to include on his tax return the tax identification number of dependents who have attained age 5.
